com.brightcove.onceux

Class ProgressManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.onceux.ProgressManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class ProgressManager
extends AbstractComponent
    Provide a class to manage the OnceUx/Player interactions. The crux of the OnceUX Plugin design is that approximately every half second an SDK progress event will occur and possibly trigger OnceUX functions. Handling these events is done by the PROGRESS event handler. An AD_DATA_READY event will enable the SDK Progress event handler while an END_DYNAMIC_VIDEO will disable the handler.
